title: Biden Says U.S. to Procure 500 Million More Covid-19 Tests
sub_head: Administration now plans to provide a total of 1 billion rapid tests to the public and to send military medical teams to hospitals, president says
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden said he is directing his administration to procure 500 million additional at-home rapid Covid-19 tests to meet demand around the country, doubling the number of tests the U.S. plans to send to the public free of charge.
“That means a billion tests in total to meet future demand,” Mr. Biden said at the White House on Thursday. He added that he intends next week to detail a plan to provide free masks to Americans.
